nodes.text: The Batil fighter was a type of starfighter that was used by the Hutt Empire during the time of the Xim Wars. A number of them were deployed during the First Battle of Vontor.

Batil fighters were first mentioned in the first part of Xim Week: The Despotica, a series of Hyperspace exclusive articles written by Michael Kogge and posted on StarWars.com in 2009. The Batil fighter was mentioned as part of an in-universe work that described the First Battle of Vontor.
